selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract numerical data from the text region in the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract the text and identify the counts of 'Dissatisfied' and 'Satisfied'.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Perform arithmetic operations to compute the ratio.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the extracted counts to compute the ratio: Number of Dissatisfied / Number of Satisfied.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the computed ratio to one decimal place.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Format the result of the division to one decimal place and return it as a string.
